climbs.name: Tipai
climbs.fa: Alex Wild, Sierra Wild, and Nicademus de la Rosa

content.description: Start as low as you can. It's a short climb anyways, so you may well get the most out of it. Pull through a few harder moves down low (crux) to better ledges up higher. Only accessible at low water level.
content.protection: Natural anchor for TR. Use webbing to sling boulders and a light rack to back it up. Lots of options. plan on extending your anchor a ways over to the edge.
content.location: To the right of Ipai Crack on the biggest wall by the falls.

climbs.name: Ipai Crack
climbs.fa: Alex and Sierra Wild, Nickademus de la Rosa, and Britta Welsch. July 2017

content.description: This is the flared crack on the left of the wall. For full value, start the climb way below the boulder, sitting right above the water. Short but fun! Do a few laps.
content.protection: Build a natural anchor for a TR. Slings, webbing, cams, etc. Extend it!
content.location: Left side of the tallest cliff above the waterfall area.
